definitions.definition: the rarefied gaseous envelope of the sun and other stars. The sun's corona is normally visible only during a total solar eclipse when it is seen as an irregularly shaped pearly glow surrounding the darkened disk of the moon.
the glow around a conductor at high potential.
examples: noun: corona discharge; plural noun: corona discharges

definitions.definition: a small circle of light seen around the sun or moon, due to diffraction by water droplets.
the cup-shaped or trumpet-shaped outgrowth at the center of a daffodil or narcissus flower.
a circular chandelier in a church.
a part of a cornice having a broad vertical face.
